__metadata.name: SDTextualInversionNSFWCleanup
__metadata.__description: This is a helper to cleanup Danbooru tags to improve the tags to create improved NSFW capable Textual Inversions

__comment: # remove all tags related to the character
# if target is anime - remove anime related tags, -- anime, illustration, 2d
# if target is realistic - remove any realistic related tags, -- 3d, photo, realistic, ....
# remove those tags, which SD-1.5-emea-pruned doesn't understand - cowboy shot
